song.englishname: Come Ye Sinners, Poor And Needy (with Amy Grant)

english.segment1: Come, ye sinners, poor and needy. Weak and wounded, sick and sore. Jesus ready, stands to save you. Full of pity, love and power
english.segment2: I will arise and go to Jesus. He will embrace me in His arms. In the arms of my dear Savior, O, there are ten thousand charms
english.segment3: Come, ye thirsty, come and welcome. God's free bounty glorify. True belief and true repentance. Every grace that brings you nigh
english.segment4: Come, ye weary, heavy-laden. Lost and ruined by the fall. If you tarry 'til you're better. You will never come at all
english.segment5: I will arise and go to Jesus. He will embrace me in His arms. In the arms of my dear Savior, O, there are ten thousand charms
english.segment6: See Him Prostate in the garden. On the ground your Maker lies. On the bloody tree, behold him. Sinner, will this not suffice?"
english.segment7: Lo! the incarnate God ascended. Pleads the merit of his blood. Venture on him, venture wholly. Let no other trust intrude
english.segment8: I will arise and go to Jesus. He will embrace me in His arms. In the arms of my dear Savior, O, there are ten thousand charms
